page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There is a fairly high level of {unemployment}in the town at present as far as the male population is concerned. Some of this is voluntary unemployment, early retirement, and retirement due to ill health. A number of people from other parts of the country have moved into the town and have been unemployed from the beginning. It is estimated that about three quarters of the female population of working age have either a full time or a part time occupation. { The Milk Factory,}engaged in the collection and distribution of milk and the production of milk products is the major employer in the town. The{railway station}which at one time was a major employer now employ few people.
